channel.title: Golang on Cameron Pfiffer
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on Cameron Pfiffer

item.title: Perfect Numbers
item.description: I just started reading a book called How to Prove It: A Structured Approach, a book all about writing and understanding proofs. My unconventional background in mathematics means that I have a fair bit of terror when it comes to proofs; they have often come up on more quantitative finance courses in a tangential manner, as the proofs are often unnessecary. The fact remains that I am terrified by them, and wanted to get over my fear of proofs.
